amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike Section 3, a prohibition on use of funds to advance the withdrawal of the United States from the Paris Agreement.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 116-42 to strike Section 3, a prohibition on use of funds to advance the withdrawal of the United States from the Paris Agreement.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 234 (Roll no. 177).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 234 (Roll no. 177).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Gosar.
